data.comment: The match is underway. Internacional have kicked-off.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 2, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional.
In Porto Alegre Internacional attack through Gabriel Boschilia. The finish is off target, however.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro are coming forward and Hyoran gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Internacional a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Internacional pushes forward through Patrick, whose finish on goal is saved.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Internacional throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Throw-in for Internacional close to the penalty box.
Goal! Thiago Galhardo gives Internacional a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 8, That's a fine assist from Patrick.
Throw-in high up the field for Atletico Mineiro in Porto Alegre.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Patrick of Internacional smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 13, Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Atletico Mineiro, close to Internacional's area.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Internacional.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in Internacional.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 21, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Atletico Mineiro's Junior Alonso misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 25, Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Internacional are caught offside.
In the minute 28, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto Alegre to check on Edenilson, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 30, Edenilson returns to the field for Internacional after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Jair (Atletico Mineiro) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 32, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Internacional throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Internacional.
Atletico Mineiro push forward at Estadio Beira-Rio and Hyoran gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Internacional defence.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 36, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 40, The match at Estadio Beira-Rio has been interrupted briefly for a check on Patrick, who is down injured.
In Porto Alegre Atletico Mineiro's Keno is caught offside.
Patrick for Internacional is back on the field again.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 45, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
The first-half has come to a close in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Atletico Mineiro kick-off.
In the minute 46, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Marquinhos is replacing Marrony for Atletico Mineiro at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Atletico Mineiro make their second substitution with Eduardo Sasha replacing Jair.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 48, Internacional will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Atletico Mineiro.
In Porto Alegre, Mariano of Atletico Mineiro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Internacional have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atletico Mineiro's Marquinhos breaks free at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 55, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Internacional a goal kick.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 59, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcos Guilherme for Internacional has been booked by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
Damian Musto is replacing Marcos Guilherme for the home team.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Internacional.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Internacional.
Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a third substitution, with Jefferson Savarino replacing Keno.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
In the minute 67, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 68, Free kick in a good position for Atletico Mineiro!
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 69, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Eduardo Sasha's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Beira-Rio with Alan Franco replacing Igor Rabello.
Internacional's Marcelo Lomba looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Attention is being given to Internacionalâ€™s Marcelo Lomba and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 72, Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Internacional's half?
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira waits before resuming play because Edenilson for Internacional is still down.
In the minute 73, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira waits before resuming play because Junior Alonso for Atletico Mineiro is still down.
Edenilson is back on his feet again.
Junior Alonso (Atletico Mineiro) has received a yellow card from Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
In the minute 75, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Internacional throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
In the minute 78, Junior Alonso is back on the pitch.
The home team have replaced Gabriel Boschilia with Andres D'Alessandro. This is the second substitution made today by Eduardo Coudet.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 79, Thiago Galhardo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Bruno Silva is on a sub for Hyoran for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 81, Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional.
In the minute 83, Internacional have a goal kick.
Internacional's Thiago Galhardo is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 85, Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Eduardo Coudet (Internacional) is making a third substitution, with Rodrigo Moledo replacing Patrick.
Thiago Galhardo, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Peglow is the substitute for Internacional.
Throw-in Internacional.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Atletico Mineiro's Junior Alonso gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Internacional defender.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Guilherme Arana of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Internacional a goal kick.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
That's full-time at Estadio Beira-Rio. The final score is 1-0.
